General.Name: Demisas Dokum Emaye Mamulleri Sanayi AS
General.Description: Demisas Döküm Emaye Mamülleri Sanayi Anonim Sirketi manufactures and markets iron casting products in Turkey. Its products include brake disks and drums, flywheels and pressure plates, exhaust manifolds, involutes, brake and engine brackets, brake safety parts, wishbones, cell connector and supporting parts, compressor housings, brake safety parts, pressure plates, compressor parts, pump housings, valve bodies, rail fastening components, scaffolding fittings, and other fittings. The company offers products for automotive, white goods, machine manufacturing, hydraulic systems, and construction sectors. It also exports its products to Italy, Tunisia, France, Germany, Belgium, Poland, Slovakia, Romania, the Czech Republic, Spain, Hungary, Holland, the Russian Federation, and England. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Kocaeli, Turkey.
